name: Larry.Exe
description:
NOTE: This game was developed for educational purposes only. All third-party assets belong to their respectful owners. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Now loading LARRY.EXE...

In this cutting-edge computer software application, you control Larry the Duck as he searches for various gems to aid in his own personal gain. 

The goal of the game is to find all the gems hidden throughout the level. You'll need to utilize Larry's jumping and hover abilities if you plan on finding them all! 

This game was developed as a student project for a college course. We hope you enjoy it just as much as we enjoyed making it. Feel free to let us know your thoughts in the comments!
